meaningMnemonic: Mix <radical>spider</radical>s into <radical>alcohol</radical> to make <kanji>acid</kanji>. Spiders have a little bit in them already, but if you really want to make it potent, smash them in some whiskey to make a deadly acid that will rip through anything.
readingMnemonic: You're trying to find a container for this <kanji>acid</kanji> when <reading>San</reading>ta-san (さん) bursts through your wall. He frowns down at you. You're on the naughty list now. You killed spiders AND made dangerous acid? Ooooh you're in trouble.
